column4: Can someone help me.. I need help getting my network card working...
i'm working on this too. here's a page i'm looking at: https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NetworkDevices
My installation got messed up and I need to have ubuntu reinstall my card again.. I don't know where the config file is or how to set it up.
this is the only thing that is working for me right now: running /etc/init.d/networking restart in a root terminal manually after startup. you can try it.
